title: 武漢肺炎-德國新增3確診(共4病例)
content:
大約共有40人與首例男子以及之前來過德國的中國女性在公司總部參加職業培訓活動有過密切接觸
如今證實增加另外三人感染了新型冠狀病毒

Drei weitere Coronavirus-Fälle in Bayern (28.01.2020)
https://www.welt.de/vermischtes/live205334991/Coronavirus-Drei-weitere-Faelle-in-Bayern-Firma-schliesst-Standort.html

Germany confirms three further cases of coronavirus (28.01.2020)
https://www.dw.com/en/germany-confirms-three-further-cases-of-coronavirus/a-52181064
The German Health Ministry confirmed late on Tuesday that three further cases of the new dangerous strain of coronavirus have been discovered in Bavaria, increasing the total numer of patients in Germany to four. The three new patients were "connected" to the first found in Germany, which had been verified on Monday.

replyTitle: 武漢肺炎歐洲首現人傳人(本土感染) 德國患者遭中國同事感染
